text:
I will talk about the place of new technology in class. For a short time, the technology take place in class and this is not a good new for all people. Technology can be represent by computer, game video, tablet... Techology take up a lot of place in our lives and now a little in the classroom. The technology can be used in differents cases like : learning, exercise, free time...
 My opinion is shared about new techology in class. First of all, I think this can motivate the child to work because it's a new method of learning really fun. For example, a student who doesn't normally like to work will  gain in desire and motivation if he works with technology. Depending on the use, this can allow the child to integrate and participate more. I think about online quizzes for example.
But, I think new technology has many disadvantages. First, for the teacher. Teachers are told that technology must be integrated into the course and the classroom. But do teachers have the skills for this? Do they have training for integrate technology? Secondly, I am also think that many children use technology a lot at home. We know that it's bad for the health. So it's a good idea to integrate this at school?
